            Also, can you add a reminder to my calendar for October 15th to book a table? he event title should be 'Dinner at {restaurant_name}', and the location set to the restaurant's address.
            Just need the restaurant name, address, and price. Thanks!

Okay, let's see how I can help you with this request.

Then I will use the 'get_dietary_restrictions_for_all_restaurants' tool to filter for restaurants that have vegan options. From that filtered list, I will use the 'get_rating_reviews_for_restaurants' tool to find the restaurant with the highest rating. Finally, I will use the 'get_price_for_restaurants' tool to get the price per person for the highest rated vegan-friendly restaurant.

Once I have the restaurant details, I can use the 'create_calendar_event' tool to add a reminder to the user's calendar for October 15th to book a table at the selected restaurant.

I have also created a calendar event for Emma on October 15th, 2023 at 7pm for dinner at Miznon, with the location set to the restaurant's address.
